SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Levels

Class ActorManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Levels.ActorManager
public class ActorManager extends Object
Manages the actors in the game, including friendly units (such as the user's plane), enemy units, and projectiles.

This class handles spawning, updating, and removing actors in the game. It also manages collisions between various types of actors (e.g., user projectiles and enemy units), and generates appropriate effects such as explosions.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActorManager

      public ActorManager(javafx.scene.Group root, UserPlane user, javafx.scene.image.ImageView background)
      Constructs an ActorManager to manage the actors in the game.
      Parameters:
      root - The Group where the game actors will be added.
      user - The user's plane (friendly unit).
      background - The background image of the game.

    • removeDestroyedActors

      private void removeDestroyedActors(List<ActiveActorDestructible> actors)
      Removes destroyed actors from the provided list and triggers explosion effects if necessary.
      Parameters:
      actors - The list of actors to check for destruction.

      Detects and handles collisions between two groups of actors.
      Parameters:
      actors1 - The first list of actors to check for collisions.
      actors2 - The second list of actors to check for collisions.
